info.title: Accounting+ API
info.description: A comprehensive accounting API that provides endpoints for managing bank cash flow vouchers and journal transactions

get.description: Get the IP address of the client

post.description: Get an access token for the client

value.message: given client id is not found

get.description: Retrieve a list of bank cash flow vouchers with filtering options

schema.description: D = Draft, F = Final, C = Canceled

post.description: Create a new bank cash flow voucher

schema.description: T = Transfer Dana, S = Kirim Dana, R = Terima Dana

get.description: Retrieve list of voucher cash categories
Retrieve a specific voucher by document number

get.description: Retrieve a specific purchase invoice by document number

400.description: Transaction data purchase invoice data not found

get.description: Retrieve a list of customers for sales invoices
Retrieve a list of sales orders

auto_create_payment.description: Set to `true` if you want to create payment automatically

bearerAuth.description: Generate a JWT signed with the `client_secret` and include the `client_id` as a claim in its payload.

signatureKey.name: A-Signature
signatureKey.description: Generate the signature by creating an `SHA256-HMAC` hash from the plain signature above, using the `signature_secret` as the key. Then, `Base64-encode` the resulting hash and place the final value in the A-Signature header.

dataKey.name: A-Data
dataKey.description: Include the `email` and `tenant_id` in the payload as Base64 encoded.
